sentences.english: However, a participant took the view that the number of seats should dovetail with the future constitutional system.
sentences.chinese: 但有嘉賓認爲，議席數目須與未來的政制銜接。

sentences.english: There will be no celebrities or any guests in the commentary box during the game.
sentences.chinese: 比賽中也不會有名人或者任何嘉賓出現在評論席。

sentences.english: Today's chat will be the guest Lin and I co-chaired the East.
sentences.chinese: 今天的嘉賓聊天將由我和東林共同主持。

sentences.english: Whenever Gaddafi visited Italy, he was paraded as a guest of honor.
sentences.chinese: 每當卡扎菲訪問意大利，他被遊街當作榮譽嘉賓。

sentences.english: Wang will be appearing in Las Vegas with Hong Kong star Joyce Lee as his guest.
sentences.chinese: 王將會和嘉賓香港歌星李樂詩一起出現在拉斯維加斯。

sentences.english: Students and guests at the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 學員們和到場嘉賓在開學典禮上合影。

sentences.english: Special Guest for this episode is Sandra Ng.
sentences.chinese: 這一集的特別嘉賓是吳君如。

sentences.english: Some participants commented that there were too many corporate votes at present and thus proposed to increase individual votes.
sentences.chinese: 有些嘉賓認爲現時團體票太多，建議增加個人票。

sentences.english: Officiating guests and the Chamber's Chairmen kick-start the "CGCC Charity Walk" with a national flag.
sentences.chinese: “千萬行”主禮嘉賓與本會首長在國旗引領下起步。

sentences.english: But he was the most talked-about feature of the conference.
sentences.chinese: 但他是這次大會最受熱議的嘉賓。

sentences.english: Guests enjoyed the delicious food as well as the fresh style performance.
sentences.chinese: 嘉賓們享用美味的同時，也一飽耳福。

sentences.english: She will be a guest performer at the concert, sharing a duet with Lin.
sentences.chinese: 她會是演唱會嘉賓，跟林宥嘉對唱一首歌曲。

sentences.english: But I tend to be protective of my guests.
sentences.chinese: 但我也會盡量保護我的嘉賓們。

sentences.english: Your wedding day will be remembered by both you and your guests.
sentences.chinese: 你的婚禮一定會被你和你的嘉賓永遠記住。

sentences.english: Ash is invited as a guest on a Goldenrod City radio program.
sentences.chinese: 粉煤灰是應邀作爲嘉賓的一枝黃花市的廣播節目。

sentences.english: Mrs. Hong Chiao is invited to be our celebrity speaker on sharing her walk with God.
sentences.chinese: 嘉賓講員喬宏太太將分享她在生命中與神同行的經歷。

definition: the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
